00035 #define REG_KEY_SIZE 50

00043 // INI strings are not localized
00044 static const TCHAR szSoftware[] = _T("Software");
00045 
00046 static CHAR gszRegistryKey[REG_KEY_SIZE];
00047 static CHAR gszAppName[REG_KEY_SIZE];
00048 static CHAR gszProfileName[REG_KEY_SIZE];
00049

00055 
00056 BOOLEAN InitializeRegistryKeys(STR lpszAppName, STR lpszRegistryKey)
00057 {
00058       CHECKF(lpszAppName != NULL);
00059       CHECKF(lpszRegistryKey != NULL);
00060       //CHECKF(gpszRegistryKey == NULL);
00061       //CHECKF(gpszAppName == NULL);
00062       //CHECKF(gpszProfileName == NULL);
00063 
00064       // Note: this will leak the original gpszProfileName, but it
00065       //  will be freed when the application exits.  No assumptions
00066       //  can be made on how gpszProfileName was allocated.
00067 
00068       strcpy( gszAppName, lpszAppName);
00069       strcpy( gszRegistryKey, lpszRegistryKey );
00070       strcpy( gszProfileName, gszAppName);
00071 
00072       return(TRUE);
00073 }
00074 
00075 // returns key for HKEY_CURRENT_USER\"Software"\RegistryKey\ProfileName
00076 // creating it if it doesn't exist
00077 // responsibility of the caller to call RegCloseKey() on the returned HKEY
00078 HKEY GetAppRegistryKey()
00079 {
00080       HKEY hAppKey = NULL;
00081       HKEY hSoftKey = NULL;
00082       HKEY hCompanyKey = NULL;
00083 
00084       assert(gszRegistryKey[0] != '\0');
00085       //assert(gpszProfileName != NULL);
00086 
00087       if (RegOpenKeyEx(HKEY_CURRENT_USER, szSoftware, 0, KEY_WRITE|KEY_READ,
00088             &hSoftKey) == ERROR_SUCCESS)
00089       {
00090             DWORD dw;
00091             if (RegCreateKeyEx(hSoftKey, gszRegistryKey, 0, REG_NONE,
00092                   REG_OPTION_NON_VOLATILE, KEY_WRITE|KEY_READ, NULL,
00093                   &hCompanyKey, &dw) == ERROR_SUCCESS)
00094             {
00095                   RegCreateKeyEx(hCompanyKey, gszProfileName, 0, REG_NONE,
00096                         REG_OPTION_NON_VOLATILE, KEY_WRITE|KEY_READ, NULL,
00097                         &hAppKey, &dw);
00098             }
00099       }
00100       if (hSoftKey != NULL)
00101             RegCloseKey(hSoftKey);
00102       if (hCompanyKey != NULL)
00103             RegCloseKey(hCompanyKey);
00104 
00105       return hAppKey;
00106 }
00107 
00108 // returns key for:
00109 //      HKEY_CURRENT_USER\"Software"\RegistryKey\AppName\lpszSection
00110 // creating it if it doesn't exist.
00111 // responsibility of the caller to call RegCloseKey() on the returned HKEY
00112 HKEY GetSectionKey(STR lpszSection)
00113 {
00114       HKEY hSectionKey = NULL;
00115       HKEY hAppKey = GetAppRegistryKey();
00116       DWORD dw;
00117 
00118       assert(lpszSection != NULL);
00119 
00120       if (hAppKey == NULL)
00121             return NULL;
00122 
00123       RegCreateKeyEx(hAppKey, lpszSection, 0, REG_NONE,
00124             REG_OPTION_NON_VOLATILE, KEY_WRITE|KEY_READ, NULL,
00125             &hSectionKey, &dw);
00126       RegCloseKey(hAppKey);
00127       return hSectionKey;
00128 }
00129 
00130 UINT GetProfileInteger(STR lpszSection, STR lpszEntry, int nDefault)
00131 {
00132       DWORD dwValue;
00133       DWORD dwType;
00134       DWORD dwCount = sizeof(DWORD);
00135       LONG lResult;
00136 
00137       assert(lpszSection != NULL);
00138       assert(lpszEntry != NULL);
00139 
00140       if (gszRegistryKey[0] != '\0') // use registry
00141       {
00142             HKEY hSecKey = GetSectionKey(lpszSection);
00143             if (hSecKey == NULL)
00144                   return nDefault;
00145             lResult = RegQueryValueEx(hSecKey, (LPTSTR)lpszEntry, NULL, &dwType,
00146                   (LPBYTE)&dwValue, &dwCount);
00147             RegCloseKey(hSecKey);
00148             if (lResult == ERROR_SUCCESS)
00149             {
00150                   assert(dwType == REG_DWORD);
00151                   assert(dwCount == sizeof(dwValue));
00152                   return (UINT)dwValue;
00153             }
00154             return nDefault;
00155       }
00156       else
00157       {
00158             assert(gszProfileName[0] != '\0');
00159             return GetPrivateProfileInt(lpszSection, lpszEntry, nDefault,
00160                   gszProfileName);
00161       }
00162 }
00163 
00164 BOOLEAN GetProfileChar(STR lpszSection, STR lpszEntry, STR lpszDefault, STR lpszValue)
00165 {
00166       DWORD       dwType, dwCount;
00167       LONG        lResult;
00168       BOOLEAN     fRet = TRUE;
00169       CHAR        strValue[200];
00170 
00171       assert(lpszSection != NULL);
00172       assert(lpszEntry != NULL);
00173       assert(lpszDefault != NULL);
00174 
00175       if (gszRegistryKey[0] != '\0')
00176       {
00177             HKEY hSecKey = GetSectionKey(lpszSection);
00178             if (hSecKey == NULL)
00179             {
00180                   strcpy( lpszValue, lpszDefault );
00181                   return(TRUE);
00182             }
00183             lResult = RegQueryValueEx(hSecKey, (LPTSTR)lpszEntry, NULL, &dwType,
00184                   NULL, &dwCount);
00185             if (lResult == ERROR_SUCCESS)
00186             {
00187                   assert(dwType == REG_SZ);
00188                   lResult = RegQueryValueEx(hSecKey, (LPTSTR)lpszEntry, NULL, &dwType,
00189                         (LPBYTE)strValue, &dwCount);
00190             }
00191             RegCloseKey(hSecKey);
00192             if (lResult == ERROR_SUCCESS)
00193             {
00194                   assert(dwType == REG_SZ);
00195                   strcpy( lpszValue, strValue );
00196                   return(TRUE);
00197             }
00198             strcpy( lpszValue, lpszDefault );
00199             return(TRUE);
00200       }
00201 //    else
00202 //    {
00203 //          assert(gpszProfileName != NULL);
00204 //
00205 //          if (lpszDefault == NULL)
00206 //                lpszDefault = &afxChNil;    // don't pass in NULL
00207 //          TCHAR szT[4096];
00208 //          DWORD dw = ::GetPrivateProfileString(lpszSection, lpszEntry,
00209 //                lpszDefault, szT, _countof(szT), gpszProfileName);
00210 //          assert(dw < 4095);
00211 //          return szT;
00212 //    }
00213 
00214       return( fRet );
00215 }

00309 
00310 BOOL WriteProfileChar(STR lpszSection, STR lpszEntry, STR lpszValue)
00311 {
00312       assert(lpszSection != NULL);
00313 
00314       if (gszRegistryKey[0] != '\0')
00315       {
00316             LONG lResult;
00317             if (lpszEntry == NULL) //delete whole section
00318             {
00319                   HKEY hAppKey = GetAppRegistryKey();
00320                   if (hAppKey == NULL)
00321                         return FALSE;
00322                   lResult = RegDeleteKey(hAppKey, lpszSection);
00323                   RegCloseKey(hAppKey);
00324             }
00325             else if (lpszValue == NULL)
00326             {
00327                   HKEY hSecKey = GetSectionKey(lpszSection);
00328                   if (hSecKey == NULL)
00329                         return FALSE;
00330                   // necessary to cast away const below
00331                   lResult = RegDeleteValue(hSecKey, (LPTSTR)lpszEntry);
00332                   RegCloseKey(hSecKey);
00333             }
00334             else
00335             {
00336                   HKEY hSecKey = GetSectionKey(lpszSection);
00337                   if (hSecKey == NULL)
00338                         return FALSE;
00339                   lResult = RegSetValueEx(hSecKey, lpszEntry, 0, REG_SZ,
00340                         (LPBYTE)lpszValue, (lstrlen(lpszValue)+1)*sizeof(TCHAR));
00341                   RegCloseKey(hSecKey);
00342             }
00343             return lResult == ERROR_SUCCESS;
00344       }
00345 //    else
00346 //    {
00347 //          assert(gpszProfileName != NULL);
00348 //          assert(lstrlen(gpszProfileName) < 4095); // can't read in bigger
00349 //          return ::WritePrivateProfileString(lpszSection, lpszEntry, lpszValue,
00350 //                gpszProfileName);
00351 //    }
00352       return TRUE;
00353 }
